n2o:sql.n2o:items-query: select :select from sr_srv_rendered s left join md_srv_protocol sp on sp.srv_rendered_id = s.id left join md_ehr_protocol p on p.id = sp.protocol_id where :where order by :order
n2o:sql.n2o:count-query: select count(s) from sr_srv_rendered s left join md_srv_protocol sp on sp.srv_rendered_id = s.id left join md_ehr_protocol p on p.id = sp.protocol_id where :where

field.expression: coalesce(coalesce(p.template_path, (select template from sr_srv_ehr_opt where service_id = s.service_id limit 1)), 'template/default.opt')
